mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMER SET TEL = #{tel}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, SKINTYPE = #{skintype}, POINTS = #{points}, GENDER = #{gender} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id}

UPDATE ORDERLIST SET RECEIVE = #{receive}, ORDER_STATUS = #{order_status}, DELIVERY_DATE = #{delivery_date}, DELIVERY_STATUS = #{delivery_status}, ORDER_ADDRESS = #{order_address} WHERE ORDER_NO = #{order_no}
UPDATE ORDERLIST SET DELIVERY_DATE = SYSDATE, DELIVERY_STATUS = '발송완료' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{order_no}
mapper.select: SELECT IVN.INVENTORY_NO INVENTORY_NO, P.IMG_URL IMG_URL, IVN.PROD_NO PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME PROD_NAME, IVN.EXIST_QTY EXIST_QTY, IVN.EXIST_PRICE EXIST_PRICE, IVN.STOCK_IN_QTY STOCK_IN_QTY, IVN.STOCK_IN_PRICE STOCK_IN_PRICE, IVN.UPDATE_DATE UPDATE_DATE FROM INVENTORY IVN INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON IVN.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO

SELECT OL.MONTH,ORDER_PRICE,DISCOUNT_PRICE,DELIVERY_PRICE, POINT_USE,PAYMENT_PRICE,SALES_PRICE,SALES_COST,(SALES_REVENUE - POINT_USE) AS SALES_REVENUE, EACH_QTY FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(ORDER_PRICE) ORDER_PRICE, SUM(DISCOUNT_PRICE) DISCOUNT_PRICE, SUM(DELIVERY_PRICE) DELIVERY_PRICE, SUM(POINT_USE) POINT_USE, SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) PAYMENT_PRICE FROM ORDERLIST GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM') ) OL INNER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(OP.SALES_PRICE * OP.EACH_QTY) SALES_PRICE, SUM(OP.SALES_COST * OP.EACH_QTY) SALES_COST, SUM(OP.SALES_REVENUE * OP.EACH_QTY) SALES_REVENUE, SUM(OP.EACH_QTY) EACH_QTY FROM ORDERLIST O INNER JOIN ORDERLIST_PRODUCT OP ON O.ORDER_NO = OP.ORDER_NO GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM') ) OPLIST ON OL.MONTH = OPLIST.MONTH ORDER BY OL.MONTH ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAY, SUM(ORDER_PRICE) ORDER_PRICE, SUM(DISCOUNT_PRICE) DISCOUNT_PRICE, SUM(DELIVERY_PRICE) DELIVERY_PRICE, SUM(POINT_USE) POINT_USE, SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) PAYMENT_PRICE FROM ORDERLIST WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-30,'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC

SELECT OL.PROD_NO PROD_NO, OL.SALES_PRICE SALES_PRICE, OL.SALES_COST SALES_COST, OL.SALES_REVENUE SALES_REVENUE, OL.EACH_QTY EACH_QTY, P.IMG_URL IMG_URL FROM ( SELECT PROD_NO, SUM(SALES_PRICE * EACH_QTY) SALES_PRICE, SUM(SALES_COST * EACH_QTY) SALES_COST, SUM(SALES_REVENUE * EACH_QTY) SALES_REVENUE, SUM(EACH_QTY) EACH_QTY FROM ORDERLIST_PRODUCT GROUP BY PROD_NO ) OL INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OL.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO ORDER BY OL.PROD_NO ASC
